name: ecoscope-test
description: EcoScope monorepo scripts to run backend (with cron) and frontend together

scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.backend:cron: cross-env SCRAPE_INTERVAL_MINUTES=15 npm --prefix backend run dev
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c green,blue "npm run backend:cron" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:5001 && npm run frontend"
scripts.dev:all:seed: concurrently -n BACKEND,SCRAPER,FRONTEND -c green,yellow,blue "npm run backend:cron" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:5001 && npm run scrape" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:5001 && npm run frontend"
